name: Rock Auto
details: A website where user can create account by both email, password and google. The user can also order parts and pay for his orders. The User can see what he/she had ordered and can also cancel his/her orders .A User can update his profile and review from review us page.An admin can add products , update products , delete product , remove user and cancel orders etc
technology: Client site tech : React , Firebase , React Router , Tailwind CSS , Daisy Ui ,  Express JS , MongoDb , cors , dotenv , Stripe payment .

name: Pop Critic
details: A Movie ratting application where viewer can rate a movie and can see the details information about the movie from Details page.
technology: ReactJS , React-Router, CSS3 , SwiperJS , React Icon, Material Ui

name: Buy Smart
details: Buy smart is a single page E-commerce application where user can create account by both Email, password and Google.An user can also add products to cart
technology: ReactJS , React-Router, Firebase , Tailwind CSS , DaisyUi,CSS3

name: Figass
details: It's a single page application for cafe and food services.All kinds of services have shown on the website in details.
